MSc.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a university degree in a science subject that you can get after your first degree
MSc.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: Multimedia Super Corridor; an area of Malaysia providing offices, telephone and computer links, and other things that are needed by IT companies
MSc.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The types of companies invited to the MSC include hardware and software vendors and R&D organisations.
MSc.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: Master of Science; a university degree in science that you can do after your first degree
